summary: Now you can roam around in light armor looking like a badass barbarian.
descriptionHtml:
The standalone version of this armor is available here!
http://skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=6684
Please take alook and dont forget to endorse! :D

This is a lore friendly armor mod that I wanted it to look \"light\" yet still maintain an ancient nord look. Unfortunately its not a standalone armor mod. Currently All my Armor mods are replacers because I don\'t know how to do standalone sets without construction kit. When the Construction Kit is released, I\'ll see if I can make this into an Armor set.

There are 2 versions. 1 replace Glass Armor, and another replace Scaled Armor  (If you would like a heavy version that replacers one of the heavy armors do comment on it)

The reason why i replace glass armor is because personally, I really hate glass armor, I hated it in Oblivion and I still hate it on Skyrim, for one thing, it doesnt look \"light\" at all, and another thing is that the design is just ilogical, Its too fancy, to forge and armor like that is just rediculous. I like my armors to look believable and immersive.

Now you can roam around in light armor looking like a badass barbarian.


This Armor is mainly for Nords, otherwise it would be weird running around with bare chest :)
but it still works for all races/genders.

--INSTALLATION--

Extract contents in the zip to Program Files (x86)\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\Data
and you are good to go
author: rahman530
